Articles.Content: Title basically sums it up. I build a ship and when trying to tilt it to 270 degrees it just keeps spinning on that axis and never stops. I can\'t get it to stop manually or through the onboard computer thing. What am I doing wrong?
You need to give a bit more information. Post a pic of the craft and say when it starts doing it. Could be a number of player errors.

it could be multiple things. Once may be not enough control surfaces. Another could be a lack of normal SAS modules (only one ASAS is necessary, if you have others, replace them with normal SAS ones), since ASAS is only attitude control, and doesn\'t have an actual force rating on it, so its effect will not increase with more of them, unlike normal SAS.

A third thing that may help is a few thrust vectoring engines (don\'t replace all your engines with thrust vectoring ones, or your ship may become mighty unstable, especially with ASAS enabled).
